The Coles County Health Department announced the death of six residents with COVID19 Thursday afternoon PERIOD

These additional deaths bring the total COVID19 deaths up to  in Coles County PERIOD

The Coles County Health Department said the following on the deaths

We would like to extend our heartfelt condolences to their families and friends PERIOD We ask for respect and privacy as they mourn the loss of their loved ones in this very difficult time. as of Thursday Coles County has had  positive cases  of which were reported on Thursday alone PERIOD The cases added to the uptick Coles County has seen in COVID19 cases PERIOD

Of the total cases  patients recovered PERIOD

There are  active cases in Coles County PERIOD

Currently  Coles County residents are fully vaccinated a total of . of the population PERIOD

In a social media post the Coles County Health Department said they are highly recommending that all community members get vaccinated wear their masks social distance and wash their hands. additionally they asked that residents help protect themselves and their community from the high level of community spread occurring in Coles County. the News Staff can be reached at  or at emailprotected PERIOD
